name: A Weight Out
description:
How can I escape Russian prison when this ball and chain is too heavy for me to pull with my legs. Good thing I have strong arms!

With the inability to move Pука (Ruka) must throw the heavy metal ball to whisk himself through the air. Game controls using left click + hold to angle throw and set power. Press 'R' to reset a level.

Made for the GMTK Game Jam 2021 by:

Shawn Turk (Programmer), Deme Reynolds (Programmer), Nick Ludowese (Programmer), Jon Reynolds (UI), Artemis Reynolds (Artist), Peter Ouellette (Artist), Adam South (music)
